name: OSHWL candidates
tagline: documents not yet in Open Source HardWare Library's SELECTION repository
body:
**everyone is welcome to meddle with those documents or add new ones!**

#OSHWL *candidates*

####documents not yet ["selected"](http://oshwl.github.io/SELECTION)

please try to have the documents meet the following criteria:

1. possible formats:
  - if not exceeding 50 lines: Markdown
  - LaTeX (unique class to be determined) in order to generate PDF and/or EPUB files (in *SELECTION*, each document's PDF and EPUB files will be made available side by side, ready to be read)
2. english language
3. subjective qualities such as completeness, readability and uniformity among others.

**please upload all the documents's source files to the same folder as the document itself**, to allow collaboration.

**big categories of OSHW work** in which documents *could* be found:
- *applications* in which the hardware in question tends to be used:
   - [energy](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/energy)
   - [transport](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/transport)
   - [agriculture](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/agriculture)
   - [water](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/water)
   - [household](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/household)
- rather *know-how*-oriented categories:
   - [manufacturing](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/manufacturing)
   - [systems](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/systems)
   - [OSHW management](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/oshw-mgmt)
   - [electro](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/electro)
   - [free/libre/open-source software for OSHW](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/floss4oshw)
- rather a hybrid of the latter two:
   - [construction](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/construction)
- rather *knowlegdge*-oriented categories:
   - [materials](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/materials)
   - [acoustics](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/acoustics)
   - [thermal](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/thermal)
   - [control](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/control)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
